title: Monday Post Show (02-07-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (02-07-22)
description:
Bobby starts the show by talking about how parents found out their daughter was involved in a hospital mix-up. Bobby talks about Hank Williams. Jr son who put up a video saying he wanted out of his conservatorship. He explains in simple terms what a conservatorship is. We talk to Caller Lexi who wants to share a riddle with us that stumps everyone but Bobby. Bobby quizzes Amy on the Top selling jerseys from each state.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
